Articles.Content:
Munar Shuttle Alpha is, as the name suggests, a relatively simple stock rocket capable of bringing you to the Mun and back with fuel to spare. It may also be capable of Minmus landings, although they haven\'t been tested with this shuttle as of now. It\'s pretty easy to handle, and has enough fuel to make up for the occasional error.

Screenshots:

In the VAB

Liftoff!

Boosters decoupled

Orbital/TMI/Deorbit stage

Landing! (Note: This picture is slightly out of date; the ship no longer contains a mechjeb)
